name: @anglr/error-handling
description: Angular module used for handling http api error handling

scripts.build: npm run build:error-handling && npm run build:material && npm run build:html2canvas
scripts.clean: rimraf dist tests **/tsdoc-metadata.json src/**/*.d.ts src/**/*.d.ts.map html2canvas/**/*.d.ts html2canvas/**/*.d.ts.map material/**/*.d.ts material/**/*.d.ts.map */*.metadata.json ./*.metadata.json ./*.d.ts ./*d.ts.map */dist
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && npm run clean:deps
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run bundle && npm run version:placeholder && npm run version:git
scripts.postpublish: npm run doc && npm run version:placeholder && npm run clean
scripts.bundle: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run clean:duplicates
scripts.doc: path-exists docs && npm run doc:generate || echo "No docs generated!"
scripts.doc:generate: npm run doc:generate:error-handling && npm run doc:generate:html2canvas && npm run doc:generate:material && npm run doc:save
scripts.doc:save: cd docs && git add . && git commit -m "INT: updated API docs ng-error-handling" && git push && cd ..
scripts.doc:generate:error-handling: rimraf docs/content/api/ng-error-handling && npm run doc:json:error-handling && npm run doc:md:error-handling
scripts.doc:md:error-handling: api-documenter markdown -i temp -o docs/content/api/ng-error-handling && rimraf temp
scripts.doc:generate:html2canvas: rimraf docs/content/api/ng-error-handling-html2canvas && npm run doc:json:html2canvas && npm run doc:md:html2canvas
scripts.doc:generate:material: rimraf docs/content/api/ng-error-handling-material && npm run doc:json:material && npm run doc:md:material

author: kukjevov
